title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4410.1 - Applicable rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4410.1 - Applicable rules

State Regulations

Unless otherwise provided in this Part, the formulas, methods of distribution and other provisions regarding pari-mutuel pools at
in-State tracks under the jurisdiction of the commission shall constitute the
rules governing pools conducted by off-track betting corporations on racing at
such tracks. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4410.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
